channel.title: Music – Steel Heart
channel.description: Recent content in Steel Heart on Music

item.title: Steel Heart - My Love Is Gone (드라마"화려한 유혹")
item.description:
I never been
so afraid
So alone
without you in my arms
Every time
I close my eyes
I die again
with you in my heart
When my tears
come to love me
I can feel again
I see us again
But when the nights
come to haunt me
I’m lost
again
The darkness
never ends
How can I live
without you babe
How do I go on
without your love
How can I love
when you’re not
With me
yeah how do I breathe
When my love is
gone oh~

I know you will
come to save me
From
this lonely road
My pain will
turn to dust
When the angels
come to find me
I’ll be free gain
I’ll be with you again
How can I live
without you babe
How do I go on
without your love
Tell me how can I love
when you’re not
With me
ah how do I breathe
When my love is
gone
I been
hanging on
Hanging on
for my dear life
Ah hold me now
somebody help me now
My world is torn
apart

Yeah how can I love
when you’re not
With me
yeah how do I breathe
When my love is
gone oh~
I send my love
and I send my love
To you
to you
